sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Microsoft ( MSFT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.6%.
Year to date, Microsoft registers a 30.6% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 1.6%.
Chevron is lower by about 10.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Exxon Mobil ( XOM ), trading down 1.2%, and Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
